`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"xml","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`<dependencies>
    <!-- spring -->
    <dependency>
        <groupId>org.springframework</groupId>
        <artifactId>spring-webmvc</artifactId>
        <version>5.3.9</version>
    </dependency>
    <!--servlet-->
    <dependency>
        <groupId>javax.servlet</groupId>
        <artifactId>servlet-api</artifactId>
        <version>2.5</version>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
        <groupId>javax.servlet.jsp</groupId>
        <artifactId>jsp-api</artifactId>
        <version>2.1</version>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
        <groupId>javax.servlet</groupId>
        <artifactId>jstl</artifactId>
        <version>1.2</version>
    </dependency>
</dependencies>

<!--\u89E3\u51B3\u8D44\u6E90\u8FC7\u6EE4\u7684\u95EE\u9898-->
<build>
    <resources>
        <resource>
            <directory>src/main/java</directory>
            <includes>
                <include>**/*.properties</include>
                <include>**/*.xml</include>
            </includes>
            <filtering>false</filtering>
        </resource>
        <resource>
            <directory>src/main/resources</directory>
            <includes>
                <include>**/*.properties</include>
                <include>**/*.xml</include>
            </includes>
            <filtering>false</filtering>
        </resource>
    </resources>
</build>

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"xml","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<web-app xmlns="http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee"
         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xsi:schemaLocation="http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee/web-app_4_0.xsd"
         version="4.0">
    <!--\u914D\u7F6EDispatchServlet-->
    <servlet>
        <servlet-name>springmvc</servlet-name>
        <servlet-class>org.springframework.web.servlet.DispatcherServlet</servlet-class>
        <!--DispatcherServlet\u8981\u7ED1\u5B9ASpring\u7684\u914D\u7F6E\u6587\u4EF6-->
        <init-param>
            <param-name>contextConfigLocation</param-name>
            <param-value>classpath:springmvc.xml</param-value>
        </init-param>
        <!--\u542F\u52A8\u7EA7\u522B\uFF1A1-->
        <load-on-startup>1</load-on-startup>
    </servlet>
    <servlet-mapping>
        <servlet-name>springmvc</servlet-name>
        <url-pattern>/</url-pattern>
    </servlet-mapping>
    <!--
        /  :\u53EA\u5339\u914D\u6240\u6709\u7684\u8BF7\u6C42\uFF0C\u4E0D\u5305\u62ECjsp\u9875\u9762
        /* :\u5339\u914D\u6240\u4EE5\u7684\u8BF7\u6C42\uFF0C\u5305\u62ECjsp\u9875\u9762
    -->
</web-app>

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"xml","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
       xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd">
    <!--\u53EF\u5220\uFF1A\u5904\u7406\u5668\u6620\u5C04\u5668-->
    <bean class="org.springframework.web.servlet.handler.BeanNameUrlHandlerMapping"/>
    <!--\u53EF\u5220\uFF1A\u5904\u7406\u5668\u9002\u914D\u5668-->
    <bean class="org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.SimpleControllerHandlerAdapter"/>
    <!--\u89C6\u56FE\u89E3\u6790\u5668-->
    <bean class="org.springframework.web.servlet.view.InternalResourceViewResolver" id="InternalResourceViewResolver">
        <!--\u524D\u7F00\u540E\u7F00-->
        <property name="prefix" value="/WE/"/>
        <property name="suffix" value=".jsp"/>
    </bean>
</beans>

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`package com.huang.controller;

import org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView;
import org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.Controller;

import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;

public class HelloController implements Controller {
    @Override
    public ModelAndView handleRequest(HttpServletRequest httpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse httpServletResponse) throws Exception {

        ModelAndView mv = new ModelAndView();
        //\u4E1A\u52A1\u4EE3\u7801
        String result ="HelloSpringMVC";
        mv.addObject("msg",result);

        //\u89C6\u56FE\u8DF3\u8F6C
        mv.setViewName("test");

        return mv;
    }
}

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"xml","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
       xmlns:context="http://www.springframework.org/schema/context"
       xmlns:mvc="http://www.springframework.org/schema/mvc"
       xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/context
       https://www.springframework.org/schema/context/spring-context.xsd
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/mvc
       https://www.springframework.org/schema/mvc/spring-mvc.xsd">

    <context:component-scan base-package="com.huang.controller"/>
    <mvc:default-servlet-handler />
    <mvc:annotation-driven />
   
    <!-- \u89C6\u56FE\u89E3\u6790\u5668 -->
    <bean class="org.springframework.web.servlet.view.InternalResourceViewResolver"
          id="internalResourceViewResolver">
        <!-- \u524D\u7F00 -->
        <property name="prefix" value="/WEB-INF/jsp/" />
        <!-- \u540E\u7F00 -->
        <property name="suffix" value=".jsp" />
    </bean>
</beans>

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`package com.huang.controller;

import org.springframework.stereotype.Controller;
import org.springframework.ui.Model;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMapping;

@Controller
@RequestMapping("/HelloController")
public class HelloController {
    //\u771F\u5B9E\u8BBF\u95EE\u5730\u5740 : \u9879\u76EE\u540D/HelloController/hello
    @RequestMapping("/hello")
    public String sayHello(Model model){
        //\u5C01\u88C5\u6570\u636E,\u5411\u6A21\u578B\u4E2D\u6DFB\u52A0\u5C5E\u6027msg\u4E0E\u503C\uFF0C\u53EF\u4EE5\u5728JSP\u9875\u9762\u4E2D\u53D6\u51FA\u5E76\u6E32\u67D3
        model.addAttribute("msg","hello,SpringMVC");
        //web-inf/jsp/hello.jsp \u88AB\u89C6\u56FE\u89E3\u6790\u5668\u5904\u7406
        return "hello";
    }
}

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`@Controller
public class RestFulController {

   //\u6620\u5C04\u8BBF\u95EE\u8DEF\u5F84
   @RequestMapping("/commit/{p1}/{p2}")
   public String index(@PathVariable int p1, @PathVariable int p2, Model model){
       
       int result = p1+p2;
       //Spring MVC\u4F1A\u81EA\u52A8\u5B9E\u4F8B\u5316\u4E00\u4E2AModel\u5BF9\u8C61\u7528\u4E8E\u5411\u89C6\u56FE\u4E2D\u4F20\u503C
       model.addAttribute("msg", "\u7ED3\u679C\uFF1A"+result);
       //\u8FD4\u56DE\u89C6\u56FE\u4F4D\u7F6E
       return "test";
       
  }
   
}

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`package com.huang.controller;

import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.ModelAttribute;

import javax.servlet.http.HttpSession;

public class BaseController {
    @ModelAttribute
    public void isLogin(HttpSession session) throws Exception {
        if(session.getAttribute("user") == null){
            //\u672A\u767B\u5F55\u8DF3\u8F6C
            throw new Exception("\u6CA1\u6709\u6743\u9650");
        }
    }
}

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`@Controller
public class ResultGo {

   @RequestMapping("/result/t1")
   public void test1(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse rsp) throws IOException {
       rsp.getWriter().println("Hello,Spring BY servlet API");
  }

   @RequestMapping("/result/t2")
   public void test2(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse rsp) throws IOException {
       rsp.sendRedirect("/index.jsp");
  }

   @RequestMapping("/result/t3")
   public void test3(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse rsp) throws Exception {
       //\u8F6C\u53D1
       req.setAttribute("msg","/result/t3");
       req.getRequestDispatcher("/WEB-INF/jsp/test.jsp").forward(req,rsp);
  }

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`package com.huang.filter;

import javax.servlet.*;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequestWrapper;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException;
import java.util.Map;

/**
* \u89E3\u51B3get\u548Cpost\u8BF7\u6C42 \u5168\u90E8\u4E71\u7801\u7684\u8FC7\u6EE4\u5668
*/
public class GenericEncodingFilter implements Filter {

   @Override
   public void destroy() {
  }

   @Override
   public void doFilter(ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, FilterChain chain) throws IOException, ServletException {
       //\u5904\u7406response\u7684\u5B57\u7B26\u7F16\u7801
       HttpServletResponse myResponse=(HttpServletResponse) response;
       myResponse.setContentType("text/html;charset=UTF-8");

       // \u8F6C\u578B\u4E3A\u4E0E\u534F\u8BAE\u76F8\u5173\u5BF9\u8C61
       HttpServletRequest httpServletRequest = (HttpServletRequest) request;
       // \u5BF9request\u5305\u88C5\u589E\u5F3A
       HttpServletRequest myrequest = new MyRequest(httpServletRequest);
       chain.doFilter(myrequest, response);
  }

   @Override
   public void init(FilterConfig filterConfig) throws ServletException {
  }

}

//\u81EA\u5B9A\u4E49request\u5BF9\u8C61\uFF0CHttpServletRequest\u7684\u5305\u88C5\u7C7B
class MyRequest extends HttpServletRequestWrapper {

   private HttpServletRequest request;
   //\u662F\u5426\u7F16\u7801\u7684\u6807\u8BB0
   private boolean hasEncode;
   //\u5B9A\u4E49\u4E00\u4E2A\u53EF\u4EE5\u4F20\u5165HttpServletRequest\u5BF9\u8C61\u7684\u6784\u9020\u51FD\u6570\uFF0C\u4EE5\u4FBF\u5BF9\u5176\u8FDB\u884C\u88C5\u9970
   public MyRequest(HttpServletRequest request) {
       super(request);// super\u5FC5\u987B\u5199
       this.request = request;
  }

   // \u5BF9\u9700\u8981\u589E\u5F3A\u65B9\u6CD5 \u8FDB\u884C\u8986\u76D6
   @Override
   public Map getParameterMap() {
       // \u5148\u83B7\u5F97\u8BF7\u6C42\u65B9\u5F0F
       String method = request.getMethod();
       if (method.equalsIgnoreCase("post")) {
           // post\u8BF7\u6C42
           try {
               // \u5904\u7406post\u4E71\u7801
               request.setCharacterEncoding("utf-8");
               return request.getParameterMap();
          } catch (UnsupportedEncodingException e) {
               e.printStackTrace();
          }
      } else if (method.equalsIgnoreCase("get")) {
           // get\u8BF7\u6C42
           Map<String, String[]> parameterMap = request.getParameterMap();
           if (!hasEncode) { // \u786E\u4FDDget\u624B\u52A8\u7F16\u7801\u903B\u8F91\u53EA\u8FD0\u884C\u4E00\u6B21
               for (String parameterName : parameterMap.keySet()) {
                   String[] values = parameterMap.get(parameterName);
                   if (values != null) {
                       for (int i = 0; i < values.length; i++) {
                           try {
                               // \u5904\u7406get\u4E71\u7801
                               values[i] = new String(values[i]
                                      .getBytes("ISO-8859-1"), "utf-8");
                          } catch (UnsupportedEncodingException e) {
                               e.printStackTrace();
                          }
                      }
                  }
              }
               hasEncode = true;
          }
           return parameterMap;
      }
       return super.getParameterMap();
  }

   //\u53D6\u4E00\u4E2A\u503C
   @Override
   public String getParameter(String name) {
       Map<String, String[]> parameterMap = getParameterMap();
       String[] values = parameterMap.get(name);
       if (values == null) {
           return null;
      }
       return values[0]; // \u53D6\u56DE\u53C2\u6570\u7684\u7B2C\u4E00\u4E2A\u503C
  }

   //\u53D6\u6240\u6709\u503C
   @Override
   public String[] getParameterValues(String name) {
       Map<String, String[]> parameterMap = getParameterMap();
       String[] values = parameterMap.get(name);
       return values;
  }
}

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`class MyInterceptor implements HandlerInterceptor {

   //\u5728\u8BF7\u6C42\u5904\u7406\u7684\u65B9\u6CD5\u4E4B\u524D\u6267\u884C
   //\u5982\u679C\u8FD4\u56DEtrue\u6267\u884C\u4E0B\u4E00\u4E2A\u62E6\u622A\u5668
   //\u5982\u679C\u8FD4\u56DEfalse\u5C31\u4E0D\u6267\u884C\u4E0B\u4E00\u4E2A\u62E6\u622A\u5668
   public boolean preHandle(HttpServletRequest httpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse httpServletResponse, Object o) throws Exception {
       System.out.println("------------\u5904\u7406\u524D------------");
       return true;
  }

   //\u5728\u8BF7\u6C42\u5904\u7406\u65B9\u6CD5\u6267\u884C\u4E4B\u540E\u6267\u884C
   public void postHandle(HttpServletRequest httpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse httpServletResponse, Object o, ModelAndView modelAndView) throws Exception {
       System.out.println("------------\u5904\u7406\u540E------------");
  }

   //\u5728dispatcherServlet\u5904\u7406\u540E\u6267\u884C,\u505A\u6E05\u7406\u5DE5\u4F5C.
   public void afterCompletion(HttpServletRequest httpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse httpServletResponse, Object o, Exception e) throws Exception {
       System.out.println("------------\u6E05\u7406------------");
  }
}

       <!--/admin/** \u62E6\u622A\u7684\u662F/admin/\u4E0B\u7684\u6240\u6709-->
       <mvc:mapping path="/**"/>
       <!--bean\u914D\u7F6E\u7684\u5C31\u662F\u62E6\u622A\u5668-->
       <bean class="com.huang.interceptor.MyInterceptor"/>
   </mvc:interceptor>
</mvc:interceptors>

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`package com.kuang.controller;

import org.springframework.stereotype.Controller;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMapping;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.ResponseBody;

//\u6D4B\u8BD5\u62E6\u622A\u5668\u7684\u63A7\u5236\u5668
@Controller
public class InterceptorController {

   @RequestMapping("/interceptor")
   @ResponseBody
   public String testFunction() {
       System.out.println("\u63A7\u5236\u5668\u4E2D\u7684\u65B9\u6CD5\u6267\u884C\u4E86");
       return "hello";
  }
}

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`package com.kuang.controller;

import org.springframework.stereotype.Controller;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMapping;

import javax.servlet.http.HttpSession;

@Controller
@RequestMapping("/user")
public class UserController {

   //\u8DF3\u8F6C\u5230\u767B\u9646\u9875\u9762
   @RequestMapping("/jumplogin")
   public String jumpLogin() throws Exception {
       return "login";
  }

   //\u8DF3\u8F6C\u5230\u6210\u529F\u9875\u9762
   @RequestMapping("/jumpSuccess")
   public String jumpSuccess() throws Exception {
       return "success";
  }

   //\u767B\u9646\u63D0\u4EA4
   @RequestMapping("/login")
   public String login(HttpSession session, String username, String pwd) throws Exception {
       // \u5411session\u8BB0\u5F55\u7528\u6237\u8EAB\u4EFD\u4FE1\u606F
       System.out.println("\u63A5\u6536\u524D\u7AEF==="+username);
       session.setAttribute("user", username);
       return "success";
  }

   //\u9000\u51FA\u767B\u9646
   @RequestMapping("logout")
   public String logout(HttpSession session) throws Exception {
       // session \u8FC7\u671F
       session.invalidate();
       return "login";
  }
}

4\u3001\u5728 index \u9875\u9762\u4E0A\u6D4B\u8BD5\u8DF3\u8F6C\uFF01\u542F\u52A8Tomcat \u6D4B\u8BD5\uFF0C\u672A\u767B\u5F55\u4E5F\u53EF\u4EE5\u8FDB\u5165\u4E3B\u9875\uFF01

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`package com.huang.interceptor;

import com.huang.util.Constants;
import org.springframework.web.servlet.HandlerInterceptor;

import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpSession;

public class LoginInterceptor implements HandlerInterceptor {

    @Override
    public boolean preHandle(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response, Object handler) throws Exception {
        //\u653E\u884C\uFF1A\u5224\u65AD\u4EC0\u4E48\u60C5\u51B5\u4E0B\u767B\u5F55
        //session\u4E0D\u4E3A\u7A7A\u8BF4\u660E\u767B\u5F55\u8FC7\u6CA1\u6CE8\u9500\uFF0C\u5E76\u4E14\u6CA1\u6709\u5173\u95ED\u8FC7\u7A97\u53E3
        HttpSession session = request.getSession();
        if (session.getAttribute(Constants.USER_SESSION) != null) {
            return true;
        }

        //\u767B\u5F55\u9875\u9762\u4E5F\u8981\u653E\u884C
        if (request.getRequestURI().contains("login")) {
            return true;
        }

        // \u7528\u6237\u6CA1\u6709\u767B\u9646\u8DF3\u8F6C\u5230\u767B\u9646\u9875\u9762
        response.sendRedirect("/login.jsp");
        return false;
    }
}

<bean id="multipartResolver"  class="org.springframework.web.multipart.commons.CommonsMultipartResolver">
   <!-- \u8BF7\u6C42\u7684\u7F16\u7801\u683C\u5F0F\uFF0C\u5FC5\u987B\u548CjSP\u7684pageEncoding\u5C5E\u6027\u4E00\u81F4\uFF0C\u4EE5\u4FBF\u6B63\u786E\u8BFB\u53D6\u8868\u5355\u7684\u5185\u5BB9\uFF0C\u9ED8\u8BA4\u4E3AISO-8859-1 -->
   <property name="defaultEncoding" value="utf-8"/>
   <!-- \u4E0A\u4F20\u6587\u4EF6\u5927\u5C0F\u4E0A\u9650\uFF0C\u5355\u4F4D\u4E3A\u5B57\u8282\uFF0810485760=10M\uFF09 -->
   <property name="maxUploadSize" value="10485760"/>
   <property name="maxInMemorySize" value="40960"/>
</bean>

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`package com.kuang.controller;

import org.springframework.stereotype.Controller;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMapping;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestParam;
import org.springframework.web.multipart.commons.CommonsMultipartFile;

import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import java.io.*;

@Controller
public class FileController {
   //@RequestParam("file") \u5C06name=file\u63A7\u4EF6\u5F97\u5230\u7684\u6587\u4EF6\u5C01\u88C5\u6210CommonsMultipartFile \u5BF9\u8C61
   //\u6279\u91CF\u4E0A\u4F20CommonsMultipartFile\u5219\u4E3A\u6570\u7EC4\u5373\u53EF
   @RequestMapping("/upload")
   public String fileUpload(@RequestParam("file") CommonsMultipartFile file , HttpServletRequest request) throws IOException {

       //\u83B7\u53D6\u6587\u4EF6\u540D : file.getOriginalFilename();
       String uploadFileName = file.getOriginalFilename();

       //\u5982\u679C\u6587\u4EF6\u540D\u4E3A\u7A7A\uFF0C\u76F4\u63A5\u56DE\u5230\u9996\u9875\uFF01
       if ("".equals(uploadFileName)){
           return "redirect:/index.jsp";
      }
       System.out.println("\u4E0A\u4F20\u6587\u4EF6\u540D : "+uploadFileName);

       //\u4E0A\u4F20\u8DEF\u5F84\u4FDD\u5B58\u8BBE\u7F6E
       String path = request.getServletContext().getRealPath("/upload");
       //\u5982\u679C\u8DEF\u5F84\u4E0D\u5B58\u5728\uFF0C\u521B\u5EFA\u4E00\u4E2A
       File realPath = new File(path);
       if (!realPath.exists()){
           realPath.mkdir();
      }
       System.out.println("\u4E0A\u4F20\u6587\u4EF6\u4FDD\u5B58\u5730\u5740\uFF1A"+realPath);

       InputStream is = file.getInputStream(); //\u6587\u4EF6\u8F93\u5165\u6D41
       OutputStream os = new FileOutputStream(new File(realPath,uploadFileName)); //\u6587\u4EF6\u8F93\u51FA\u6D41

       //\u8BFB\u53D6\u5199\u51FA
       int len=0;
       byte[] buffer = new byte[1024];
       while ((len=is.read(buffer))!=-1){
           os.write(buffer,0,len);
           os.flush();
      }
       os.close();
       is.close();
       return "redirect:/index.jsp";
  }
}

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`/*
* \u91C7\u7528file.Transto \u6765\u4FDD\u5B58\u4E0A\u4F20\u7684\u6587\u4EF6
*/
@RequestMapping("/upload2")
public String  fileUpload2(@RequestParam("file") CommonsMultipartFile file, HttpServletRequest request) throws IOException {

   //\u4E0A\u4F20\u8DEF\u5F84\u4FDD\u5B58\u8BBE\u7F6E
   String path = request.getServletContext().getRealPath("/upload");
   File realPath = new File(path);
   if (!realPath.exists()){
       realPath.mkdir();
  }
   //\u4E0A\u4F20\u6587\u4EF6\u5730\u5740
   System.out.println("\u4E0A\u4F20\u6587\u4EF6\u4FDD\u5B58\u5730\u5740\uFF1A"+realPath);

   //\u901A\u8FC7CommonsMultipartFile\u7684\u65B9\u6CD5\u76F4\u63A5\u5199\u6587\u4EF6\uFF08\u6CE8\u610F\u8FD9\u4E2A\u65F6\u5019\uFF09
   file.transferTo(new File(realPath +"/"+ file.getOriginalFilename()));

   return "redirect:/index.jsp";
}

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`@RequestMapping(value="/download")
public String downloads(HttpServletResponse response ,HttpServletRequest request) throws Exception{
   //\u8981\u4E0B\u8F7D\u7684\u56FE\u7247\u5730\u5740
   String  path = request.getServletContext().getRealPath("/upload");
   String  fileName = "\u57FA\u7840\u8BED\u6CD5.jpg";

   //1\u3001\u8BBE\u7F6Eresponse \u54CD\u5E94\u5934
   response.reset(); //\u8BBE\u7F6E\u9875\u9762\u4E0D\u7F13\u5B58,\u6E05\u7A7Abuffer
   response.setCharacterEncoding("UTF-8"); //\u5B57\u7B26\u7F16\u7801
   response.setContentType("multipart/form-data"); //\u4E8C\u8FDB\u5236\u4F20\u8F93\u6570\u636E
   //\u8BBE\u7F6E\u54CD\u5E94\u5934
   response.setHeader("Content-Disposition",
           "attachment;fileName="+URLEncoder.encode(fileName, "UTF-8"));

   File file = new File(path,fileName);
   //2\u3001 \u8BFB\u53D6\u6587\u4EF6--\u8F93\u5165\u6D41
   InputStream input=new FileInputStream(file);
   //3\u3001 \u5199\u51FA\u6587\u4EF6--\u8F93\u51FA\u6D41
   OutputStream out = response.getOutputStream();

   byte[] buff =new byte[1024];
   int index=0;
   //4\u3001\u6267\u884C \u5199\u51FA\u64CD\u4F5C
   while((index= input.read(buff))!= -1){
       out.write(buff, 0, index);
       out.flush();
  }
   out.close();
   input.close();
   return null;
}

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"xml","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`<dependencies>
    <!--Junit-->
    <dependency>
        <groupId>junit</groupId>
        <artifactId>junit</artifactId>
        <version>4.11</version>
        <scope>test</scope>
    </dependency>

    <!--\u6570\u636E\u5E93\u9A71\u52A8-->
    <dependency>
        <groupId>mysql</groupId>
        <artifactId>mysql-connector-java</artifactId>
        <version>8.0.22</version>
    </dependency>

    <!-- \u6570\u636E\u5E93\u8FDE\u63A5\u6C60 -->
    <dependency>
        <groupId>com.mchange</groupId>
        <artifactId>c3p0</artifactId>
        <version>0.9.5.2</version>
    </dependency>

    <!--Servlet - JSP -->
    <dependency>
        <groupId>javax.servlet</groupId>
        <artifactId>javax.servlet-api</artifactId>
        <version>4.0.1</version>
        <scope>provided</scope>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
        <groupId>javax.servlet.jsp</groupId>
        <artifactId>javax.servlet.jsp-api</artifactId>
        <version>2.3.3</version>
        <scope>provided</scope>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
        <groupId>javax.servlet</groupId>
        <artifactId>jstl</artifactId>
        <version>1.2</version>
    </dependency>

    <!--Mybatis-->
    <dependency>
        <groupId>org.mybatis</groupId>
        <artifactId>mybatis</artifactId>
        <version>3.5.7</version>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
        <groupId>org.mybatis</groupId>
        <artifactId>mybatis-spring</artifactId>
        <version>2.0.6</version>
    </dependency>

    <!--Spring-->
    <dependency>
        <groupId>org.springframework</groupId>
        <artifactId>spring-webmvc</artifactId>
        <version>5.3.9</version>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
        <groupId>org.springframework</groupId>
        <artifactId>spring-jdbc</artifactId>
        <version>5.3.9</version>
    </dependency>
    
    <!--Lombok-->
    <dependency>
        <groupId>org.projectlombok</groupId>
        <artifactId>lombok</artifactId>
        <version>1.18.20</version>
        <scope>provided</scope>
    </dependency>
</dependencies>

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`package com.huang.dao;

import com.huang.pojo.Books;
import org.apache.ibatis.annotations.Param;

import java.util.List;

public interface BookMapper {
    //\u589E\u52A0\u4E00\u4E2ABook
    int addBook(Books books);

    //\u6839\u636Eid\u5220\u9664\u4E00\u4E2ABook
    int deleteBookById(@Param("bookID") int id);

    //\u66F4\u65B0Book
    int updateBook(Books books);

    //\u6839\u636Eid\u67E5\u8BE2,\u8FD4\u56DE\u4E00\u4E2ABook
    Books queryBookById(@Param("bookID") int id);

    //\u67E5\u8BE2\u5168\u90E8Book,\u8FD4\u56DElist\u96C6\u5408
    List<Books> queryAllBook();
}

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.p,{children:"5\u3001\u7F16\u5199\u63A5\u53E3\u5BF9\u5E94\u7684 Mapper.xml \u6587\u4EF6\u3002\u5C06\u914D\u7F6E\u6587\u4EF6\u62F7\u8D1D\uFF0C\u4FEE\u6539configuration\u4E3Amapper"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/heavenmei/Desktop/heavenmei.io/content/note/Java/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-46ffa65f-030e-4e52-9f36-a900842287d2.mdx",lineNumber:1523,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"xml","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<!DOCTYPE mapper
        PUBLIC "-//mybatis.org//DTD Config 3.0//EN"
        "http://mybatis.org/dtd/mybatis-3-mapper.dtd">
<mapper namespace="com.huang.dao.BookMapper">

    <!--\u589E\u52A0\u4E00\u4E2ABook-->
    <insert id="addBook" parameterType="Books">
        insert into ssmbuild.books(bookName,bookCounts,detail)
        values (#{bookName}, #{bookCounts}, #{detail})
    </insert>

    <!--\u6839\u636Eid\u5220\u9664\u4E00\u4E2ABook-->
    <delete id="deleteBookById" parameterType="int">
        delete from ssmbuild.books where bookID=#{bookID}
    </delete>

    <!--\u66F4\u65B0Book-->
    <update id="updateBook" parameterType="Books">
        update ssmbuild.books
        set bookName = #{bookName},bookCounts = #{bookCounts},detail = #{detail}
        where bookID = #{bookID}
    </update>

    <!--\u6839\u636Eid\u67E5\u8BE2,\u8FD4\u56DE\u4E00\u4E2ABook-->
    <select id="queryBookById" resultType="Books">
        select * from ssmbuild.books
        where bookID = #{bookID}
    </select>

    <!--\u67E5\u8BE2\u5168\u90E8Book-->
    <select id="queryAllBook" resultType="Books">
        SELECT * from ssmbuild.books
    </select>
    
</mapper>

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`package com.huang.service;

import com.huang.pojo.Books;
import java.util.List;

//BookService:\u5E95\u4E0B\u9700\u8981\u53BB\u5B9E\u73B0,\u8C03\u7528dao\u5C42
public interface BookService {
    //\u589E\u52A0\u4E00\u4E2ABook
    int addBook(Books books);

    //\u6839\u636Eid\u5220\u9664\u4E00\u4E2ABook
    int deleteBookById(int id);

    //\u66F4\u65B0Book
    int updateBook(Books books);

    //\u6839\u636Eid\u67E5\u8BE2,\u8FD4\u56DE\u4E00\u4E2ABook
    Books queryBookById(int id);

    //\u67E5\u8BE2\u5168\u90E8Book,\u8FD4\u56DElist\u96C6\u5408
    List<Books> queryAllBook();
}

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`package com.huang.service;

import com.huang.dao.BookMapper;
import com.huang.pojo.Books;

import java.util.List;

public class BookServiceImpl implements BookService{
    //\u8C03\u7528dao\u5C42\u7684\u64CD\u4F5C\uFF0C\u8BBE\u7F6E\u4E00\u4E2Aset\u63A5\u53E3\uFF0C\u65B9\u4FBFSpring\u7BA1\u7406
    private BookMapper bookMapper;
    public void setBookMapper(BookMapper bookMapper) {
        this.bookMapper = bookMapper;
    }

    @Override
    public int addBook(Books books) {
        return bookMapper.addBook(books);
    }

    @Override
    public int deleteBookById(int id) {
        return bookMapper.deleteBookById(id);
    }

    @Override
    public int updateBook(Books books) {
        return bookMapper.updateBook(books);
    }

    @Override
    public Books queryBookById(int id) {
        return bookMapper.queryBookById(id);
    }

    @Override
    public List<Books> queryAllBook() {
        return bookMapper.queryAllBook();
    }
}

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"xml","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
       xmlns:context="http://www.springframework.org/schema/context"
       xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/context
       https://www.springframework.org/schema/context/spring-context.xsd">

    <!--1.\u5173\u8054\u6570\u636E\u5E93\u6587\u4EF6-->
    <context:property-placeholder location="classpath:database.properties"/>

    <!--2.\u8FDE\u63A5\u6C60
        dbcp \u534A\u81EA\u52A8\u5316\u64CD\u4F5C \u4E0D\u80FD\u81EA\u52A8\u8FDE\u63A5
        c3p0 \u81EA\u52A8\u5316\u64CD\u4F5C\uFF08\u81EA\u52A8\u7684\u52A0\u8F7D\u914D\u7F6E\u6587\u4EF6 \u5E76\u4E14\u8BBE\u7F6E\u5230\u5BF9\u8C61\u91CC\u9762\uFF09
    -->
    <bean id="dataSource" class="com.mchange.v2.c3p0.ComboPooledDataSource">
        <!-- \u914D\u7F6E\u8FDE\u63A5\u6C60\u5C5E\u6027 -->
        <property name="driverClass" value="\${jdbc.driver}"/>
        <property name="jdbcUrl" value="\${jdbc.url}"/>
        <property name="user" value="\${jdbc.username}"/>
        <property name="password" value="\${jdbc.password}"/>

        <!-- c3p0\u8FDE\u63A5\u6C60\u7684\u79C1\u6709\u5C5E\u6027 -->
        <property name="maxPoolSize" value="30"/>
        <property name="minPoolSize" value="10"/>
        <!-- \u5173\u95ED\u8FDE\u63A5\u540E\u4E0D\u81EA\u52A8commit -->
        <property name="autoCommitOnClose" value="false"/>
        <!-- \u83B7\u53D6\u8FDE\u63A5\u8D85\u65F6\u65F6\u95F4 -->
        <property name="checkoutTimeout" value="10000"/>
        <!-- \u5F53\u83B7\u53D6\u8FDE\u63A5\u5931\u8D25\u91CD\u8BD5\u6B21\u6570 -->
        <property name="acquireRetryAttempts" value="2"/>
    </bean>

    <!--3.sqlSessionFactory-->
    <bean id="sqlSessionFactory" class="org.mybatis.spring.SqlSessionFactoryBean">
        <property name="dataSource" ref="dataSource"/>
        <!--\u7ED1\u5B9AMybatis\u914D\u7F6E\u6587\u4EF6-->
        <property name="configLocation" value="classpath:mybatis-config.xml"/>
    </bean>

    <!-- 4.\u914D\u7F6E\u626B\u63CFDao\u63A5\u53E3\u5305\uFF0C\u52A8\u6001\u5B9E\u73B0Dao\u63A5\u53E3\u6CE8\u5165\u5230spring\u5BB9\u5668\u4E2D -->
    <bean class="org.mybatis.spring.mapper.MapperScannerConfigurer">
        <!-- \u6CE8\u5165sqlSessionFactory -->
        <property name="sqlSessionFactoryBeanName" value="sqlSessionFactory"/>
        <!-- \u7ED9\u51FA\u9700\u8981\u626B\u63CFDao\u63A5\u53E3\u5305 -->
        <property name="basePackage" value="com.huang.dao"/>
    </bean>
    
</beans>

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"xml","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
       xmlns:context="http://www.springframework.org/schema/context"
       xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/context
       https://www.springframework.org/schema/context/spring-context.xsd">

    <!-- \u626B\u63CFservice\u76F8\u5173\u7684bean -->
    <context:component-scan base-package="com.huang.service"/>

    <!--BookServiceImpl\u6CE8\u5165\u5230IOC\u5BB9\u5668\u4E2D-->
    <bean id="BookServiceImpl" class="com.huang.service.BookServiceImpl">
        <property name="bookMapper" ref="bookMapper"/>
    </bean>

    <!-- \u914D\u7F6E\u4E8B\u52A1\u7BA1\u7406\u5668 -->
    <bean id="transactionManager" class="org.springframework.jdbc.datasource.DataSourceTransactionManager">
        <!-- \u6CE8\u5165\u6570\u636E\u5E93\u8FDE\u63A5\u6C60 -->
        <property name="dataSource" ref="dataSource"/>
    </bean>

</beans>

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"xml","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<web-app xmlns="http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee"
         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xsi:schemaLocation="http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee/web-app_4_0.xsd"
         version="4.0">

    <!--DispatcherServlet-->
    <servlet>
        <servlet-name>DispatcherServlet</servlet-name>
        <servlet-class>org.springframework.web.servlet.DispatcherServlet</servlet-class>
        <init-param>
            <param-name>contextConfigLocation</param-name>
            <!--\u4E00\u5B9A\u8981\u6CE8\u610F:\u6211\u4EEC\u8FD9\u91CC\u52A0\u8F7D\u7684\u662F\u603B\u7684\u914D\u7F6E\u6587\u4EF6\uFF0C\u4E4B\u524D\u88AB\u8FD9\u91CC\u5751\u4E86\uFF01-->
            <param-value>classpath:applicationContext.xml</param-value>
        </init-param>
        <load-on-startup>1</load-on-startup>
    </servlet>
    <servlet-mapping>
        <servlet-name>DispatcherServlet</servlet-name>
        <url-pattern>/</url-pattern>
    </servlet-mapping>

    <!--encodingFilter-->
    <filter>
        <filter-name>encodingFilter</filter-name>
        <filter-class>org.springframework.web.filter.CharacterEncodingFilter</filter-class>
        <init-param>
            <param-name>encoding</param-name>
            <param-value>utf-8</param-value>
        </init-param>
    </filter>
    <filter-mapping>
        <filter-name>encodingFilter</filter-name>
        <url-pattern>/*</url-pattern>
    </filter-mapping>

    <!--Session\u8FC7\u671F\u65F6\u95F4-->
    <session-config>
        <session-timeout>15</session-timeout>
    </session-config>

<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
       xmlns:mvc="http://www.springframework.org/schema/mvc"
       xmlns:context="http://www.springframework.org/schema/context"

       https://www.springframework.org/schema/mvc/spring-mvc.xsd http://www.springframework.org/schema/context https://www.springframework.org/schema/context/spring-context.xsd">

    <!--1\u3001\u6CE8\u89E3\u9A71\u52A8-->
    <mvc:annotation-driven/>
    <!--2\u3001\u9759\u6001\u8D44\u6E90\u8FC7\u6EE4-->
    <mvc:default-servlet-handler/>
    <!--3\u3001\u626B\u63CF\u5305\uFF1Acontroller-->
    <context:component-scan base-package="com.huang.*"/>
    <!--4\u3001\u89C6\u56FE\u89E3\u6790\u5668-->
    <bean class="org.springframework.web.servlet.view.InternalResourceViewResolver">
        <property name="prefix" value="/WEB-INF/jsp/"/>
        <property name="suffix" value=".jsp"/>
    </bean>

</beans>

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`package com.huang.controller;

import com.huang.pojo.Books;
import com.huang.service.BookService;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Qualifier;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Controller;
import org.springframework.ui.Model;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMapping;

import java.util.List;

@Controller
@RequestMapping("/book")
public class BookController {
    //controller \u8C03 service\u5C42
    @Autowired
    @Qualifier("BookServiceImpl")
    private BookService bookService;

    @RequestMapping("/allBook")
    public String list(Model model) {
        List<Books> list = bookService.queryAllBook();
        model.addAttribute("list", list);
        return "allBook";
    }
}

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"jsp","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`<%@ taglib prefix="c" uri="http://java.sun.com/jsp/jstl/core" %>
<%@ page contentType="text/html;charset=UTF-8" language="java" %>
<html>
<head>
   <title>\u4E66\u7C4D\u5217\u8868</title>
   <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
   <!-- \u5F15\u5165 Bootstrap -->
   <link href="https://cdn.bootcss.com/bootstrap/3.3.7/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
</head>
<body>

<div class="container">

   <div class="row clearfix">
       <div class="col-md-12 column">
           <div class="page-header">
               <h1>
                   <small>\u4E66\u7C4D\u5217\u8868 \u2014\u2014 \u663E\u793A\u6240\u6709\u4E66\u7C4D</small>
               </h1>
           </div>
       </div>
   </div>

   <div class="row">
       <div class="col-md-4 column">
           <a class="btn btn-primary" href="\${pageContext.request.contextPath}/book/toAddBook">\u65B0\u589E</a>
       </div>
   </div>

   <div class="row clearfix">
       <div class="col-md-12 column">
           <table class="table table-hover table-striped">
               <thead>
               <tr>
                   <th>\u4E66\u7C4D\u7F16\u53F7</th>
                   <th>\u4E66\u7C4D\u540D\u5B57</th>
                   <th>\u4E66\u7C4D\u6570\u91CF</th>
                   <th>\u4E66\u7C4D\u8BE6\u60C5</th>
                   <th>\u64CD\u4F5C</th>
               </tr>
               </thead>

               <tbody>
               <c:forEach var="book" items="\${requestScope.get('list')}">
                   <tr>
                       <td>\${book.getBookID()}</td>
                       <td>\${book.getBookName()}</td>
                       <td>\${book.getBookCounts()}</td>
                       <td>\${book.getDetail()}</td>
                       <td>
                           <a href="\${pageContext.request.contextPath}/book/toUpdateBook?id=\${book.getBookID()}">\u66F4\u6539</a> |
                           <a href="\${pageContext.request.contextPath}/book/del/\${book.getBookID()}">\u5220\u9664</a>
                       </td>
                   </tr>
               </c:forEach>
               </tbody>
           </table>
       </div>
   </div>
</div>

public String toAddPaper() {
   return "addBook";
}

@RequestMapping("/addBook")
public String addPaper(Books books) {
   System.out.println(books);
   bookService.addBook(books);
   return "redirect:/book/allBook";
}

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`@RequestMapping("/toUpdateBook")
public String toUpdateBook(Model model, int id) {
   Books books = bookService.queryBookById(id);
   System.out.println(books);
   model.addAttribute("book",books );
   return "updateBook";
}

@RequestMapping("/updateBook")
public String updateBook(Model model, Books book) {
   System.out.println(book);
   bookService.updateBook(book);
   Books books = bookService.queryBookById(book.getBookID());
   model.addAttribute("books", books);
   return "redirect:/book/allBook";

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"jsp","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`<%@ taglib prefix="c" uri="http://java.sun.com/jsp/jstl/core" %>
<%@ page contentType="text/html;charset=UTF-8" language="java" %>
<html>
<head>
   <title>\u4FEE\u6539\u4FE1\u606F</title>
   <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
   <!-- \u5F15\u5165 Bootstrap -->
   <link href="https://cdn.bootcss.com/bootstrap/3.3.7/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
</head>
<body>
<div class="container">

   <div class="row clearfix">
       <div class="col-md-12 column">
           <div class="page-header">
               <h1>
                   <small>\u4FEE\u6539\u4FE1\u606F</small>
               </h1>
           </div>
       </div>
   </div>

   <form action="\${pageContext.request.contextPath}/book/updateBook" method="post">
       <input type="hidden" name="bookID" value="\${book.getBookID()}"/>
      \u4E66\u7C4D\u540D\u79F0\uFF1A<input type="text" name="bookName" value="\${book.getBookName()}"/>
      \u4E66\u7C4D\u6570\u91CF\uFF1A<input type="text" name="bookCounts" value="\${book.getBookCounts()}"/>
      \u4E66\u7C4D\u8BE6\u60C5\uFF1A<input type="text" name="detail" value="\${book.getDetail() }"/>
       <input type="submit" value="\u63D0\u4EA4"/>
   </form>

</div>
